This test verifies the names, positions and sizes of the highlight rectangles overlayed on CSS Grid areas.

grid-with-areas{
  "paths": [
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        401,
        0,
        "L",
        401,
        601,
        "L",
